tool_input.old_string:
generator client {
  provider = "prisma-client-js"
}

datasource db {
  provider = "postgresql"
  url      = env("DATABASE_URL")
}

model Provider {
  id        String         @id @default(uuid())
  name      String         @unique
  type      ProviderType
  config    Json
  logoUrl   String?
  active    Boolean        @default(true)
  createdAt DateTime       @default(now())
  updatedAt DateTime       @updatedAt
  imports   ProviderImport[]
  proxies   Proxy[]
}

enum ProviderType {
  api
  file
  manual
}

model Proxy {
  id           String     @id @default(uuid())
  provider     Provider?  @relation(fields: [providerId], references: [id])
  providerId   String?
  pool         String
  host         String
  port         Int
  username     String?
  password     String?
  protocol     String     @default("http")
  country      String?
  region       String?
  city         String?
  latitude     Float?
  longitude    Float?
  asn          Int?
  org          String?
  lastChecked  DateTime?
  lastUsed     DateTime?
  failedCount  Int        @default(0)
  score        Float      @default(100)
  tags         String[]
  meta         Json?
  disabled     Boolean    @default(false)
  createdAt    DateTime   @default(now())
  updatedAt    DateTime   @updatedAt

  leases       Lease[]

  @@index([pool])
  @@index([providerId])
  @@index([score])
}
tool_input.new_string:
generator client {
  provider = "prisma-client-js"
}

datasource db {
  provider = "postgresql"
  url      = env("DATABASE_URL")
}

model Provider {
  id        String             @id @default(uuid())
  name      String             @unique
  type      ProviderType
  config    Json
  logoUrl   String?
  active    Boolean            @default(true)
  createdAt DateTime           @default(now())
  updatedAt DateTime           @updatedAt
  imports   ProviderImport[]
  proxies   Proxy[]
}

enum ProviderType {
  api
  file
  manual
}

model Proxy {
  id          String    @id @default(uuid())
  provider    Provider? @relation(fields: [providerId], references: [id])
  providerId  String?
  pool        String
  host        String
  port        Int
  username    String?
  password    String?
  protocol    String    @default("http")
  country     String?
  region      String?
  city        String?
  latitude    Float?
  longitude   Float?
  asn         Int?
  org         String?
  lastChecked DateTime?
  lastUsed    DateTime?
  failedCount Int       @default(0)
  score       Float     @default(100)
  tags        String[]
  meta        Json?
  disabled    Boolean   @default(false)
  createdAt   DateTime  @default(now())
  updatedAt   DateTime  @updatedAt
  leases      Lease[]

  @@index([pool])
  @@index([providerId])
  @@index([score])
}

tool_input.old_string:
model NotificationConfig {
  id            String   @id @default(uuid())
  method        String   // 'discord' | 'telegram' | 'webhook'
  enabled       Boolean  @default(false)
  config        Json     // e.g., { "webhookUrl": "..." } for discord/webhook; { "botToken": "...", "chatId": "..." } for telegram
  eventTypes    String[] // e.g., ['provider-added', 'order-rotated', 'health-fail', 'usage-alert']
  createdAt     DateTime @default(now())
  updatedAt     DateTime @updatedAt

  @@unique([method])  // One config per method
}
tool_input.new_string:
model NotificationConfig {
  id            String   @id @default(uuid())
  method        String   // 'discord' | 'telegram' | 'webhook'
  enabled       Boolean  @default(false)
  config        Json     // e.g., { "webhookUrl": "..." } for discord/webhook; { "botToken": "...", "chatId": "..." } for telegram
  eventTypes    String[] // e.g., ['provider-added', 'order-rotated', 'health-fail', 'usage-alert']
  createdAt     DateTime @default(now())
  updatedAt     DateTime @updatedAt

  @@unique([method])  // One config per method
}

model AppSettings {
  id        String   @id @default(uuid())
  key       String   @unique
  value     Json
  updatedAt DateTime @updatedAt
  createdAt DateTime @default(now())
}

tool_input.old_string:
FROM node:20
RUN apt-get update && apt-get install -y build-essential python3 && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*

# Install postgresql-client for pg_isready
RUN apt-get update && apt-get install -y postgresql-client && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*
WORKDIR /app/api
COPY apps/packages/api/package.json apps/packages/api/package-lock.json* ./
RUN if [ -f package-lock.json ]; then npm ci --include=dev --legacy-peer-deps; else npm install --include=dev --legacy-peer-deps; fi
COPY apps/packages/api/src ./src
COPY apps/packages/api/tsconfig.json ./
COPY apps/prisma ./prisma
RUN npx prisma generate && npx nest build
CMD ["sh", "-c", "npx prisma generate && npx nest start --watch"]
tool_input.new_string:
FROM node:20
RUN apt-get update && apt-get install -y build-essential python3 && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*

# Install postgresql-client for pg_isready
RUN apt-get update && apt-get install -y postgresql-client && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*
WORKDIR /app/api
COPY apps/packages/api/package.json apps/packages/api/package-lock.json* ./
RUN if [ -f package-lock.json ]; then npm ci --include=dev --legacy-peer-deps; else npm install --include=dev --legacy-peer-deps; fi
COPY apps/packages/api/src ./src
COPY apps/packages/api/tsconfig.json ./
COPY apps/prisma ./prisma
RUN npx prisma generate && npx nest build
CMD ["sh", "-c", "until pg_isready -h db -p 5432; do echo 'Waiting for DB...'; sleep 2; done && npx prisma migrate deploy && npx prisma generate && node dist/main.js"]

tool_input.old_string: command: sh -c "apt-get update -qq && apt-get install -y -qq build-essential python3 postgresql-client && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/* && if [ ! -d node_modules/.bin ]; then rm -rf node_modules && npm ci --include=dev --legacy-peer-deps; fi && export PATH=\"/app/api/node_modules/.bin:\$PATH\" && until pg_isready -h db -p 5432; do echo 'Waiting for DB...'; sleep 2; done && npx prisma generate && npm run dev"
tool_input.new_string: command: sh -c "apt-get update -qq && apt-get install -y -qq build-essential python3 postgresql-client && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/* && if [ ! -d node_modules/.bin ]; then rm -rf node_modules && npm ci --include=dev --legacy-peer-deps; fi && export PATH=\"/app/api/node_modules/.bin:\$PATH\" && until pg_isready -h db -p 5432; do echo 'Waiting for DB...'; sleep 2; done && npx prisma migrate deploy && npx prisma generate && npm run dev"

tool_input.old_string:
services:
  api:
    build:
      context: .
      dockerfile: apps/packages/api/Dockerfile
    env_file: .env
    ports: ["8080:8080"]
    depends_on: [db, redis]
    volumes:
      - ./geoip:/geoip
tool_input.new_string:
services:
  api:
    build:
      context: .
      dockerfile: apps/packages/api/Dockerfile
    env_file: .env
    ports: ["8080:8080"]
    depends_on:
      db:
        condition: service_healthy
      redis:
        condition: service_healthy
    volumes:
      - ./geoip:/geoip

tool_input.old_string:
db:
    image: postgres:15
    environment:
      POSTGRES_PASSWORD: postgres
      POSTGRES_DB: proxyhub
    volumes:
      - pgdata:/var/lib/postgresql/data
    ports: ["5432:5432"]
  redis:
    image: redis:7
    ports: ["6379:6379"]
    command: redis-server --logfile ""
tool_input.new_string:
db:
    image: postgres:15
    environment:
      POSTGRES_PASSWORD: postgres
      POSTGRES_DB: proxyhub
    volumes:
      - pgdata:/var/lib/postgresql/data
    ports: ["5432:5432"]
    healthcheck:
      test: ["CMD", "pg_isready", "-U", "postgres"]
      interval: 10s
      timeout: 5s
      retries: 5
  redis:
    image: redis:7
    ports: ["6379:6379"]
    command: redis-server --logfile ""
    healthcheck:
      test: ["CMD", "redis-cli", "ping"]
      interval: 10s
      timeout: 5s
      retries: 3

tool_input.command: sleep 10 && docker compose logs api 2>&1 | grep -E "(Nest|ERROR|listening|Application is running)" | tail -20

sed -i 's/import { PrismaClient } from "@prisma\/client";/import { PrismaService } from "..\/..\/common\/prisma\/prisma.service";/g' apps/packages/api/src/modules/proxies/proxies.service.ts && sed -i 's/private prisma: PrismaClient/private prisma: PrismaService/g' apps/packages/api/src/modules/proxies/proxies.service.ts
grep -r "PrismaClient" /home/andre/batcave/proxyhub-rotor-pro/apps/packages/api/src --include="*.ts" | grep -v "prisma.service.ts" | grep -v "node_modules"

sed -i 's/import { PrismaClient } from "@prisma\/client";/import { PrismaService } from "..\/..\/common\/prisma\/prisma.service";/g' apps/packages/api/src/modules/proxy/proxy.service.ts && sed -i 's/private prisma: PrismaClient/private prisma: PrismaService/g' apps/packages/api/src/modules/proxy/proxy.service.ts

sed -i '/import { PrismaClient } from/d' apps/packages/api/src/modules/proxy/proxy.module.ts && sed -i 's/PrismaClient,//' apps/packages/api/src/modules/proxy/proxy.module.ts && sed -i "7i\\import { PrismaModule } from '../../common/prisma.module';" apps/packages/api/src/modules/proxy/proxy.module.ts && sed -i 's/imports: \[HttpModule\]/imports: [PrismaModule, HttpModule]/' apps/packages/api/src/modules/proxy/proxy.module.ts

grep -r "PrismaClient" /home/andre/batcave/proxyhub-rotor-pro/apps/packages/api/src --include="*.ts" | grep -v "prisma.service.ts" | grep -v "node_modules" || echo "No more PrismaClient references found"
sleep 15 && docker compose logs api 2>&1 | grep -E "(Nest|Application is running|listening on|ERROR)" | tail -25

tool_input.command: docker compose ps
curl -s http://localhost:8080/health || curl -s http://localhost:8080/ || echo "API endpoint check"
curl -s http://localhost:8080/v1/providers | head -100
docker compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml ps
docker compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml logs api 2>&1 | grep -E "(prisma|migration|generate|Nest application successfully started)" | tail -30
tool_input.description: Check dev mode API Prisma logs

tool_input.command: docker compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml logs api 2>&1 | grep -E "(migrate|Generated Prisma Client|Nest application successfully started)" | head -20

curl -s http://localhost:8080/v1/providers | jq '.items | length' && echo "Providers endpoint working" && curl -s http://localhost:8080/v1/proxies/counts | jq '.' && echo "Proxies counts endpoint working"
docker compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml exec -T api ls -la /app/api/prisma/ | head -10
tool_input.description: Check Prisma schema in dev container

tool_input.command: docker compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml exec -T api head -30 /app/api/prisma/schema.prisma
docker compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml logs api 2>&1 | grep -E "(File change detected|Restarting|webpack)" | tail -10

echo "=== Docker Dev Mode Verification ===" && echo "" && echo "1. Container Status:" && docker compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml ps --format "table {{.Service}}\t{{.Status}}" && echo "" && echo "2. API Health:" && curl -s http://localhost:8080/v1/providers | jq -r '"\(.total) providers, \(.items | length) items returned"' && echo "" && echo "3. Prisma Schema:" && docker compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml exec -T api sh -c "grep -E '^model (Provider|Proxy|AppSettings)' /app/api/prisma/schema.prisma" && echo "" && echo "4. Volume Mounts:" && docker compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml exec -T api sh -c "ls -l /app/api/src/modules/providers/providers.service.ts | cut -d' ' -f1-9" && echo "" && echo "5. Database Connection:" && docker compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml exec -T api sh -c "npx prisma db execute --stdin <<< 'SELECT COUNT(*) as proxy_count FROM \"Proxy\";' 2>/dev/null | tail -3"

docker compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml exec -T db psql -U postgres -d proxyhub -c "SELECT table_name FROM information_schema.tables WHERE table_schema = 'public' ORDER BY table_name;" 2>/dev/null | grep -E "(Provider|Proxy|AppSettings|Lease|UsageEvent)"
